keyword: calories in a large fry from wendys
title: Calories in a Large Fry from Wendy's
meta_description: Discover calories in a large fry from Wendys—about 470 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and comparison tweaks for fast food tracking.
h1: Calories in a Large Fry from Wendy's
assumptions: Wendy's Natural-Cut Fries, large size (142 g serving), fried in vegetable oil, no added seasonings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and menu changes. Check Wendy's app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A large fry from Wendy's provides 470 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked version at home (approximate, no oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in a large fry from Wendys?
What are the carbs in Wendys large fries?
faqs.a: About 63 g total carbs, including 7 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a large Wendys fry?
faqs.a: Around 560 mg, from the frying process and salt.

faqs.q: Are Wendys large fries high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 22 g total fat per large fry, with 3.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does Wendys large fry compare to small?
faqs.a: Small is about 300 kcal; large adds ~170 kcal and more portions.
